00039     class Camera {
00040         public:
00042             enum Type {
00043                 SONY,              
00044                 PHILIPS,           
00045                 SONY_COMPOSITE,    
00046                 PHILIPS_SECOND     
00047                 };
00048             
00050             enum Format {
00051                 FORMAT_160x120,   
00052                 FORMAT_320x240,   
00053                 FORMAT_640x480,   
00054                 FORMAT_768x576    
00055                 };
00056     
00057         public:
00063             static Camera* create(Type type = SONY, Format format = FORMAT_640x480);
00064             
00065             ~Camera();
00068             bool start();
00074             bool update();
00080             bool stop();
00086             Image getImage();
00091             int width()  const { return w; }     
00092             int height() const { return h; }     
00094         protected:
00095             Camera() : handle(NULL) {}
00096             bool init(Type type = SONY, Format format = FORMAT_640x480);
00097         private:
00098             int w, h;                   // width and height of the images returned by this camera
00099             AR2VideoParamT *handle;     // the handle with the camera representation for ARToolkit
00100         };
